content.raw:
What's unique about a model is still something to work out. A scoped name of `org/usr/model_name` might conflict with the scoped name of nested models, or the world name. @iche033 and looked at grabcad.com appends to the model name string to make unique URLs: https://grabcad.com/library/bolt-and-nut-29

Idea is a user wants to name their model "car", but it's unique name might be "car-49" after it's uploaded.
